body: some guy hooked up mc to his christmas tree. you can go on his minecraft server and his website (click) and change the color of the lights of the tree in real life and turn them off and on... it's pretty crazy, what do you think? does anyone know how this is possible??
body_tagged: some guy hooked up mc to his christmas tree. you can go on his minecraft server and his website (click) and change the color of the lights of the tree in real life and turn them off and on... it's pretty crazy, what do you think? does anyone know how this is possible??
title: This guy's christmas tree

replies.body: That is really clever , it's amazing what games can do these days.
replies.body_tagged: That is really clever , it's amazing what games can do these days.

replies.body: Interesting idea! This could easily be done with a server plugin and a spark core though (I'm not sure how he did it, but this is how I would go about it). Maybe it's a project for me next year!
